ID.Description: Sequential numbers to organize the current dataset

TASK.Description: Each of 6 experimental tasks, including LocalASL, LocalSR, LocalEng, LocalEng, ReadMean, and ReadPhon

CONDITION.Description: Experimental conditions for each task. This list excludes perceptual and fixation trials.

P_FreqHal.Description: Word frequency for the prime word based on the Hyperspace Analogue to Language (HAL) norms from the English Lexicon Project

T_FreqHal.Description: Word frequency for the target word based on the HAL norms

P_BGSUM.Description: Summed frequency of all adjacent letter pairs (bigrams) in the prime word

T_BGSUM.Description: Summed frequency of all adjacent letter pairs (bigrams) in the target word

P_POS.Description: Syntactic part of speech classification of the prime word

T_POS.Description: Syntactic part of speech classification of the target word

P_P_EN.Description: Number of words that share the same orthographic rime as the prime word but differ in pronunciation, used to calculate phonological consistency

T_P_EN.Description: Number of words that share the same orthographic rime as the target word but differ in pronunciation

P_O_EN.Description: Number of words that share the same phonological rime as the prime word but differ in spelling, used to calculate orthographic consistency

T_O_EN.Description: Number of words that share the same phonological rime as the target word but differ in spelling

P_LEN.Description: Length of the prime word in number of letters

T_LEN.Description: Length of the target word in number of letters

P_P_CONS.Description: The ratio of phonological friends to total phonological neighbors (friends / [friends + phonological enemies]) for the prime word. This reflects the consistency between spelling matches the pronunciation expected based on similar words.

T_P_CONS.Description: The ratio of phonological friends to total phonological neighbors (friends / [friends + phonological enemies]) for the target word. Higher values indicate more consistent spelling-to-sound mappings.

P_O_CONS.Description: The ratio of orthographic friends to total orthographic neighbors (friends / [friends + orthographic enemies]) for the prime word. This examines how well the pronunciations of words with similar spellings align.

T_O_CONS.Description: The ratio of orthographic friends to total orthographic neighbors (friends / [friends + orthographic enemies]) for the target word.

P_ELP_NAMACC.LongName: Prime English Lexicon Project Naming Accuracy
P_ELP_NAMACC.Description: Lexical decision task naming accuracy for the prime word, derived from the English Lexicon Project

T_ELP_NAMACC.LongName: Target English Lexicon Project Naming Accuracy
T_ELP_NAMACC.Description: Lexical decision task naming accuracy for the target word

P_CH_WF.Description: Prime word frequency in children's writing, based on childLex norms

T_CH_WF.Description: Target word frequency in children's writing

P_ASLLexID.Description: Unique identifier for the prime item in the ASL-LEX database (Caselli et al., 2017). This value links to detailed lexical properties of American Sign Language signs. Imperfect matches are noted in colored cells and further explained in _DHH_Sources_StimChar.xls.

T_ASLLexID.Description: Unique identifier for the target item in the ASL-LEX database.

P_ASLLexFreq.Description: Frequency of the prime item in ASL-LEX, representing subjective frequency estimates from Deaf signers. Higher values indicate greater familiarity or usage.

T_ASLLexFreq.Description: Frequency of the target item in ASL-LEX, based on signer-rated familiarity.

P_ASLLexIcon.Description: Iconicity rating of the prime sign from the ASL-LEX database, reflecting how much the sign’s form resembles its meaning, as judged by hearing non-signers on a 1–7 scale.

T_ASLLexIcon.Description: Iconicity of the target sign, based on ASL-LEX normative data.

P_ELEX.Description: Percent naming agreement for the prime item from the ELEX1 norms in the International Picture Naming Project (IPNP), representing how consistently participants named the image using the intended label.

T_ELEX.Description: Percent naming agreement for the target item from ELEX1 in the IPNP database.

P_PHFREQ.Description: Positional probability of adjacent phoneme pairs in the prime word, computed using the University of Kansas Phonotactic Probability Calculator. Higher values indicate greater phonotactic probability.

T_PHFREQ.Description: Positional probability of adjacent phoneme pairs in the target word, based on the University of Kansas Phonotactic Probability Calculator.

ASS.Description: Forward association strength based on the University of South Florida Free Association Norms (Nelson et al., 1998). This indicates the likelihood that the prime word elicits the target word as a response.
